specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > Slub Slub yarn is made with varying thicknesses, causing the fabric to have a bumpy texture. It adds a unique texture and character to the fabric's surface.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Pajamas, Shirts, Blouses
